question: Which of the following is the preaching mudra associated with the Buddha’s First Sermon at Sarnath?
explanation: The Buddha\'s first sermon is sometimes called the \"first turning of the dharma wheel.\" Or “dharmachakra”. The sermon, Buddha gave to the five monks, was his first sermon and was called the Dhammacakkappavattana Sutta. It was given on the full-moon day of Asalha Puja. Buddha subsequently also spent his first rainy season at Sarnath at the Mulagandhakuti.
